actionConfiguration.body:
UPDATE WeighBridge SET
    WB_Docket = '{{Edit_Valid.data.WBDocketInV}}',
    Date = '{{Edit_Valid.data.DateInV.split('T')[0]}}',
    Rego = '{{Edit_Valid.data.RegoInV}}',
    Supplier = '{{Edit_Valid.data.SupplierInV}}',
    Operations = '{{Edit_Valid.data.OperationsInV}}',
    Coupe = '{{Edit_Valid.data.CoupeInV}}',
    Harvestor = '{{Edit_Valid.data.HarvestorInV}}',
    FPP = '{{Edit_Valid.data.FPPInV}}',
    Gross = '{{Edit_Valid.data.GrossInV}}',
    Tare = '{{Edit_Valid.data.TareInV}}',
    GMT = '{{Edit_Valid.data.GMTInV}}',
    Grade = '{{Edit_Valid.data.GradeInV}}',
    Length = '{{Edit_Valid.data.LengthInV}}'
  WHERE Docket = '{{wb_data_table.selectedRow.Docket}}'; -- Specify a valid condition here. Removing the condition may update every row in the table!
